content: please note the pattern download is in colour painterly scarf design that lets you get creative with your yarn designed with hedgehog fibres 2025 advent calendar in mind this scarf utilises 24 different coloured speckled mini skeins the pattern is worked in two row stripes incorporating slipped stitches which creates the effect of stranded knitting yarn is held double throughout the project to achieve this wind centre pull balls and knit from both inside and outside strand together
